Class Market

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.co.crider.jablus.data.CompoundData
      • uk.co.crider.jablus.models.dairy.env.Market
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable, Data, DataSet, DriverDynamic, DriverEndogeneous

    public class Market
extends CompoundData
implements DriverDynamic, DriverEndogeneous
    Encapsulates all economics-based behaviour

      • buy

        public boolean buy(int product,
          double qty)
        Buy something
        Parameters:
        product - name of product to buy
        qty - the quantity of the product to buy
        Returns:
        true if the transaction was possible (ie, funds available and qty > 0)
